Verses: 1 idho, Sagodharar Orumiththu Vaasampannugiradhu Eththanai Nanmaiyum Eththanai Inbamumaanadhu?
2 adhu Aaronudaiya Sirasinmel Ootrappattu, Avanudaiya Thaadiyile Vadigiradhum, Avanudaiya Angigalinmel Irangugiradhumaana Nalla Thailaththukkum,
3 ermonmelum, Seeyon Parvadhangalmelum Irangum Panikkum Oppaayirukkiradhu; Ange Karththar Endrendraikkum Aaseervaadhaththaiyum Jeevanaiyum Kattalaiyidugiraar.
